item.title: Software Engineer: Application Developer
item.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain a TMSP application to solve classic distributed systems problems like key-value storage, locking, leader-election, service discovery, etc (ie. a TMSP version of consul or etcd).

item.title: Software Engineer: Application Developer and Dev Outreach
item.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Maintain an implementation of TMSP and some example applications in Javascript
  • Develop and maintain a framework for smart contracts in javascript (eg. https://deterministic.js.org/)
  • Developer Outreach, tutorials, and onboarding new developers
